item.title: csmertx
item.description: Christopher Roy Schammert | aka: Chris/Sharky LGM (Linux Gremlin Mysteries) LGM is a pet project website with a little bin of fun mixed in with a lot of RTFM. Mostly an easy way to check the notes from multiple devices–or from a family member’s computer. Donation Button Clarification The donation button for this website redirects to the ðŸ”— Wounded Warrior Project This website is not an affiliated with the Wounded Warrior Project
